issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
In view file, index.xml, I am trying to figure out what options are available to set for the module. The code complete doesn't provide a full list of options.

Height and width do not appear nor it auto-completes.

Could you please update the code complete to show the full list of options available? This would make development much faster and less frustrating.
fields.summary: code complete and options not working as expected for XML files

comments.body: You are trying to autocomplete on the {{<Module />}} tag that is a generic way to include module-views in Alloy. Since the Studio can not know about the public API interface of the module, it's autocomplete-suggestions are limited to the general XML-ones. Alright?
